data.eml:eml: Annotated checklist of anthiadine fishes (Percoidei: Serranidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article William D. Anderson, Jr. (2018): Annotated checklist of anthiadine fishes (Percoidei: Serranidae). Zootaxa 4475 (1): 1-62, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4475.1.1
